source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, cartodb_id as id, altmappdf FROM citymap_amendments_v0 WHERE effective IS NOT NULL
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, official_s AS streetname, streetwidt AS streetwidth FROM citymap_streetcenterlines_v0

SELECT *, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) = '-' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2) WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[A-Z]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2) WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[0-9]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 3) ELSE zonedist END as primaryzone FROM zoning_districts_v201803
